title: Question
body: I reported my account,because someone change my verification email.My question is when can I get my account back?

replies.body:
If you've submitted a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), then you simply need to sit tight until one of our account specialists can reach back out and assist you in recovering the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I can't estimate that since our ticket queues are rather high due to the end of the ranked season. I can, however, confirm that our specialists are working their butts off and will certainly get back to you as soon as possible.
I have sent an information about my account.The specialist updated my request,but my account is still banned and my verification email cannot be change still.
